price: (A kì í jẹ àwọn ènìyàn níyà) títí di ìgbà tí àwọn Òjíṣẹ́ bá tó sọ̀rètí nù (nípa ìgbàgbọ́ wọn), tí wọ́n sì mọ̀ pé wọ́n ti pe àwọn ní òpùrọ́. Àrànṣe Wa yó sì dé bá wọn. A sì máa gba ẹni tí A bá fẹ́ là. Wọn kò lè dá ìyà Wa padà lórí ìjọ ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا ٱسۡتَيۡـَٔسَ ٱلرُّسُلُ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ قَدۡ كُذِبُواْ جَآءَهُمۡ نَصۡرُنَا فَنُجِّيَ مَن نَّشَآءُۖ وَلَا يُرَدُّ بَأۡسُنَا عَنِ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā is'tayasa al-rusulu waẓannū annahum qad kudhibū jāahum naṣrunā fanujjiya man nashāu walā yuraddu basunā ʿani al-qawmi al-muj'rimīna
